alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 12:56AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Prowers and northern Baca Counties through 145 AM MDT... At 1256 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Two Buttes Reservoir to 11 miles west of Two Buttes to 7 miles east of Pritchett. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Walsh, Vilas, Two Buttes and Two Buttes Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
